ova.name: Detective Conan OVA 09: The Stranger in 10 Years...

ova.selection2: Conan and Ran are visiting Heiji and Kazuha in Osaka when the four come across a trio of kids while touring the city. These children, who look eerily similar to the Detective Boys but with different p...read more.

ova.name: Detective Conan OVA 04: Conan and Kid and Crystal Mother
ova.selection2: Once again, Kaitou Kid has a target in mind: the Crystal Mother, Europe's largest topaz owned by Queen Selizabeth of the Principality of Ingram. He intends to steal this jewel while the Queen is stuck...read more.

ova.name: Detective Conan OVA 12: The Miracle of Excalibur
ova.selection2: The Miracle of Excalibur is the twelfth OVA of the anime and manga franchise Detective Conan. The plot is based on Gosho Aoyama's short story "Excalibur." (Source: Detective Conan World)

ova.name: Detective Conan: Anti-Crime Guide
ova.selection2: A Meitantei Conan education anime aimed at children. It's an anti-crime guide that teaches children how they should react in different scenarios through a question-answer format. An accompanying book...read more.

ova.name: Detective Conan Bonus File: Fantasista Flower
ova.selection2: "Fantasista Flower" is a side-story OVA related to The Eleventh Striker. (Source: Detective Conan World)

ova.name: Detective Conan OVA 05: The Target is Kogoro! The Detective Boys' Secret Investigation
ova.selection2: Conan Edogawa and his classmates are assigned to do a class report about a small business of their choice. After discarding other possible topics, the Detective Boys concludes that it's a perfect oppo...read more.

ova.name: Detective Conan OVA 11: A Secret Order from London
ova.selection2: Diana invites Kogorou and Ran to London, but since Conan cannot travel with his invented name, Ai gives him a temporary antidote, letting him travel as Kudou Shin'ichi. Together with Professor Agasa t...read more.

ova.name: Detective Conan OVA 07: A Challenge from Agasa! Agasa vs. Conan and the Detective Boys
ova.selection2: Professor Agasa is kidnapped and the Detective Boys must use clues found at his house and in various parts of the city in order to find him.

ova.name: Detective Conan OVA 06: Follow the Vanished Diamond! Conan & Heiji vs. Kid!
ova.selection2: One day Mori Kogoro's private detective agency receives a blackmail call. It turns out that the caller has dialed the wrong number. Conan is able to identify the voice on the phone, it's similar to th...read more.

ova.name: Detective Conan OVA 08: High School Girl Detective Sonoko Suzuki's Case Files
ova.selection2: Sonoko is writing a script for a play. In her script, there's a murder case, and high-school detective Suzuki Sonoko is there to help solve it. Haibara finds flaws in the deduction section of the plot...read more.
